app.name: Terri-Fried
app.long_description:
Everyone is dead except for... an egg. Humanity is depending on you to make sure this egg survives. Balance power and precision in Terri-Fried, a game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46!
Hold the A button and move the Wii remote to form a trajectory for the egg, and release A to send it flying!
